titleStmt.title: Instructions made by the Right Honourable Edward Russel, admiral, in the year 1691. For the better ordering the fleet in sailing by day and night and in fighting.
titleStmt.author: Orford, Edward Russell, Earl of, 1653-1727.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
